Proof for HNR #4
C1L D0R  H1L E0L  D1R C1L  E1L A1R  B1L D0L  |  3911891 | ---- |1942 |  0  9  0  8  0 22  0 33  0 59  0 57  0 57  0

Consider the bitstring 11 to stand in for the bit 0,
and consider bitstring 10 to stand in for the bit 1.
Let #x denote the number x written right to left using these symbols.

I claim that whenever the tape head is left of all 1 bits,
the configuration is

o11#x(11)^n1011 C,

where x is a number and n = x - ceil(log_2(x)).

The machine then increments x and appends 11 unless x's length has increased. Thus

o11#(x+1)(11)^(n+1)1011 C, or
o11#(x+1)(11)^(n  )1011 C, if x+1 is a power of 2.

Examples:
4377 C o11 1110111010 111111111111111111111111111111111111111111   1011
4710 C o11 1010111010 11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111 1011
x = 11010_2 = 26
n = 21 = 26 - ceil(log_2(26))

6150 C o11 1010101010   1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111 1011
6523 C o11 111111111110 1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111 1011
x = 11111_2 = 31
n = 26 = 31 - ceil(log_2(31))

In the meantime, it will go all the way to the right, e.g.:
4377 C o11 1110111010 111111111111111111111111111111111111111111 1011
4452 D 11  0111011111 010101010101010101010101010101010101010101 11010o 

The tape now has the composition

11$x(01)^n11010o D,

where $x writes x right-to-left with 01 as 0 and 11 as 1.

Another example:
6150 C o11 1010101010 1111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111 1011
6243 D 11  1111111111 0101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101010101 11010o

From beginning till then,

4377 C o111110111010...
4378 D 1i11110111010...
4379 A 11i1110111010...
4380 D 110i110111010...
4381 A 1101i10111010...
4382 D 11010i0111010...
4383 A 110101o111010...
4384 C 11010i1111010...
4385 C 1101o11111010...
4386 D 11011i1111010...
4387 A 110111i111010...
4388 D 1101110i11010...
4389 A 11011101i1010...
4390 D 110111010i010...
4391 A 1101110101o10...
4392 C 110111010i110...
4393 C 11011101o1110...
4394 D 110111011i110...
4395 A 1101110111i10...
4396 D 11011101110i0...
4397 A 110111011101o...
4398 C 11011101110i1...
4399 C 1101110111o11...
4400 D 11011101111i1...
4401 A 110111011111i...
